index.title: MiSide: Lépj be a titokzatos MiSide világba
index.description: MiSide is a unique psychological horror adventure game that blends first-person exploration with visual novel elements, a rich storyline and interesting plot.

hero.title: MiSide
hero.subtitle: Ahol a valóság találkozik a szimulációval, ott a romantika és a horror
hero.content: Lépj be egy titokzatos világba, ahol egy hétköznapi főszereplő egy mobil szimulációs játék csapdájában találja magát. A romantikus játékokra jellemző, látszólag hétköznapi feladatoknak induló sötét fordulatot vesz, ami egy egyre nyugtalanítóbb utazáshoz vezet, tele feszültséggel és kiszámíthatatlansággal.

about.title: A MiSide-ról
content: “Képzeljük el, hogy van egy játékod, amelyben törődsz egy karakterrel. De el tudod képzelni, hogy egy nap maga is belevág ebbe a játékba?” -Aihasto

A MiSide egy innovatív kalandjáték, amely mesterien építi be a horror elemeket, és a játékélmények egyedülálló keverékét hozza létre. A játék az első személyű kalandmechanikát ötvözi a vizuális újszerű történetmeséléssel.

A MiSide jellegzetes művészeti stílusa 3D-s grafikával és anime hatásokkal, amelyet autentikus hangsáv egészít ki, amely a történet előrehaladtával átvált a meleg dallamokból a kísérteties környezeti hangokba.

gameplay.title: Merülj el a rejtélyes MiSide világában
gameplay.subtitle: Tapasztald meg a kaland és a horror egyedülálló keverékét

content.title: Kaland horror játékmenet
content.content: Fedezz fel sötét szobákat, lépj kapcsolatba tárgyakkal, keress nyomokat, és kerüld el a veszélyeket, például egy őrült karakter zaklatását.

content.title: MiSide minijátékok és rejtvények
content.content: Vegyél részt különféle minijátékokban és rejtvényekben, amelyek ízt és kihívást adnak a játékmenethez.

content.title: Többféle befejezés
content.content: A MiSide játék során hozott döntéseid különböző befejezésekhez vezetnek, növelve az újrajátszhatóságot és ösztönözve a történet különböző útvonalainak felfedezését.

content.title: Pszichológiai horror
content.content: Tapasztald meg a pszichológiai feszültség és a természetfeletti horror keverékét a MiSide-ban, amely nyugtalanító légkört teremt és fenntartja az érdeklődést.

content.title: Döntéseken alapuló előrehaladás
content.content: Hozz döntéseket, amelyek befolyásolják a történetet és a karakterek közti interakciókat, lehetővé téve a személyre szabott játékélményt.

ingame.title: Fedezd fel, mi teszi egyedivé a MiSide-t
ingame.subtitle: Fedezd fel a MiSide lenyűgöző játékmenetét

content.title: Testreszabható Főhős
content.content: Testreszabhatod a karaktered megjelenését és tulajdonságait, hogy fokozd az élményt a MiSide világában.

content.title: Dinamikus Karakter Interakciók
content.content: Kapcsolatba léphetsz különböző karakterekkel, különösen Mitával, akinek személyisége a MiSide játék során fejlődik, felfedve mélyebb pszichológiai témákat.

content.title: Atmoszferikus Hangtervezés
content.content: Merülj el egy gondosan megtervezett hangvilágban, amely környezeti zajokkal és zenével fokozza a feszültséget és a borzongást.

content.title: Egyedi Vizualitás
content.content: Élvezd a élénk, anime ihlette művészeti stílust, amely éles kontrasztot alkot a horror témákkal, így egy nyugtalanító ellentétet teremtve.

content.title: Haladás Követés
content.content: Kövesd a fejlődésedet eredmények és gyűjthető tárgyak segítségével, amelyek betekintést nyújtanak a MiSide játékmenet élményébe.

content.title: Hangalámondás Támogatás
content.content: Élvezd a hangalámondás támogatását (jelenleg japánul és oroszul elérhető), amely mélyebb dimenziókat ad a karakterek közötti interakciókhoz és fokozza a történetmesélést.

mitas.title: The Mitas in MiSide
mitas.subtitle: Meet the diverse cast of Mitas, the central characters in MiSide's immersive world.

guides.title: MiSide legújabb útmutatók
guides.subtitle: Fedezd fel a MiSide legújabb útmutatóit

reviews.title: Mit mondanak a játékosok a MiSide-ról
reviews.subtitle: Miért szeretik az emberek annyira a MiSide-ot?

content.name: Horrorrajongó
content.content: A MiSide tökéletesen kihasználja a horror műfaj minden elemét, különösen az audiovizuális eszközöket. A feszültségvezérelt atmoszféra és a nyugtalanító esztétika valóban félelmetes élményt nyújt.

content.name: Vizual Novel Szakértő
content.content: A MiSide bájos karaktereinek és szürreális horror elemeinek keveréke mesterien van kivitelezve. Az ambivalens narratíva arra ösztönzi a játékosokat, hogy maguk rakják össze az eseményeket.

content.name: Kalandjátékos
content.content: A MiSide játékmenete a klasszikus kaland-horror elemekre emlékeztet, ahol a felfedezés és a rejtvények megoldása kulcsfontosságú, és végig fenntartja a figyelmet.

content.name: Hangtervező
content.content: A MiSide csúcsminőségű audiovizuális élménye nyugtalanító légkört teremt anélkül, hogy túlterhelné a játékost. A meleg dallamoktól a baljós környezeti hangokig való átmenet különösen hatásos.

content.name: Történetelemző
content.content: Annak ellenére, hogy a játékba szippantás ismert klisé, a MiSide története lebilincselő marad, meggyőző karakterekkel és kiváló szinkronnal.

content.name: Technikai Értékelő
content.content: Bár néha előfordulnak hibák és tempóproblémák, az összkép letisztult, és a minijátékok, valamint a gyűjthető elemek mélységet adnak a játékmenetnek.

faq.title: MiSide GYIK
faq.subtitle: Gyakran Ismételt Kérdések a MiSide-dal kapcsolatban

content.question: Mi az a MiSide?
content.answer: A MiSide egy kalandjáték horror elemekkel, amely egy egyszerű srác történetét meséli el, aki titokzatos módon egy mobil szimulációban találja magát.

content.question: Milyen játékmenetre számíthatok?
content.answer: A MiSide ötvözi a kalandhorrort és a vizuális regény elemeit, beleértve a felfedezést, rejtvényfejtést és karakterekkel való interakciókat. A játékosok sötét szobákat fedeznek fel, tárgyakkal lépnek kapcsolatba, és döntéseket hoznak, amelyek befolyásolják a történet kimenetelét.

content.question: Milyen platformokon érhető el a MiSide?
content.answer: A MiSide Windows rendszeren érhető el, és olyan platformokról tölthető le, mint az itch.io és a Steam.

content.question: Mennyi egy átlagos játékmenet hossza?
content.answer: Egy átlagos játékmenet körülbelül fél órát tart.

content.question: Van szinkron a MiSide-ban?
content.answer: Igen, a MiSide tartalmaz szinkront, amely jelenleg orosz nyelven érhető el. Ez mélységet ad a karakterekkel való interakciókhoz és fokozza a történetmesélés élményét.

content.question: Vannak többféle befejezések?
content.answer: Igen, a játék során hozott döntések különböző befejezésekhez vezetnek, ezzel növelve az újrajátszhatóságot.

content.question: Hány achievement van a MiSide-ban?
content.answer: A MiSide 26 achievementet tartalmaz, amelyeket különféle feladatok teljesítésével lehet feloldani a játék során.

content.question: Újrajátszhatom a fejezeteket?
content.answer: Igen, a játék befejezése után a főmenüből újra látogathatók a fejezetek. Ez lehetőséget ad achievementek feloldására vagy eltérő történeti utak felfedezésére.

content.question: Lesznek új tartalmak a MiSide-hoz?
content.answer: Igen, várhatóak frissítések, amelyek új tartalmakat és funkciókat tartalmaznak a játékosok visszajelzései alapján.

content.question: Terveznek folytatást a MiSide-hoz?
content.answer: Bár konkrét részletek még nem ismertek, mind a játékosok, mind a fejlesztők részéről érdeklődés mutatkozik folytatások vagy kiegészítések iránt.

content.question: Támogatja a játék a kontrollert?
content.answer: A játék támogatja a kontrollert, de előfordulhatnak hibák. Ha problémát tapasztalsz, próbáld meg kihúzni a kontrollert és újraindítani a játékot.

content.question: Mit tegyek, ha a játék folyamatosan jobbra mozog?
content.answer: Ez a probléma akkor fordulhat elő, ha egy kontroller csatlakoztatva van. A kontroller kihúzása és a játék újraindítása megoldhatja a problémát.

privacy.title: Adatvédelmi szabályzat | MiSide
privacy.description: A MiSide adatvédelmi szabályzata. Ismerd meg, hogyan védjük meg adataidat, miközben a tartalmainkat böngészed.

blogentry.title: MiSide útmutató és blog
blogentry.description: Fedezd fel az átfogó MiSide útmutatót, hogy megismerd a játék legújabb frissítéseit, a játékosok választásait, a többszörös befejezést és még sok mást.
blogentry.subtitle: Legújabb MiSide útmutatók

blogs.name: A MiSide összes befejezése
blogs.desc: Ismerd meg a MiSide különféle befejezéseit, azok jelentőségét és azt, hogyan nyithatod meg őket.

blogs.name: A MiSide összes achievementje
blogs.desc: Fedezd fel a MiSide 26 egyedi achievementjét, és tudd meg, hogyan szerezheted meg őket.

blogs.name: Gyors MiSide végigjátszás
blogs.desc: Szerezz gyors áttekintést a MiSide történetéről és játékmenetéről, beleértve a prológust, fejezeteket és kihívásokat.

miside-endings.description: A MiSide három fő befejezést tartalmaz, amelyeket a játékosok a játék során hozott döntéseik alapján érhetnek el. Itt van egy részletes áttekintés minden befejezésről:

miside-achievements.title: A MiSide összes achievementje - MiSide Útmutató
miside-achievements.description: A MiSide 26 egyedi achievementet tartalmaz, amelyeket a játék során különféle feladatok elvégzésével lehet megszerezni. Itt van egy részletes áttekintés minden achievementről:

miside-walkthrough.title: Gyors MiSide végigjátszás - MiSide Útmutató
miside-walkthrough.description: Szerezz gyors áttekintést a MiSide történetéről és játékmenetéről, beleértve a prológust, fejezeteket és kihívásokat. Ez a végigjátszás segít gyorsan belépni a MiSide világába.

mita-miside-wiki.title: Mita MiSide Karakter Wiki | MiSide
mita-miside-wiki.description: Mita (Őrült Mita) a MiSide főszereplője. Ez a wiki információkat nyújt Mitáról, beleértve az áttekintést, a személyiségét, a megjelenését és a szerepét.
mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Mita

content.title: Figyelemre méltó tulajdonságok
content.content: Megszállott, manipulatív, instabil, hibás, társaságra vágyó

overview: Őrült Mita egy jelentős karakter a MiSide-ban, aki a főszereplő mesterséges intelligencia-barátjának sötétebb, torzabb oldalát képviseli.
Kezdetben bájos társként jelenik meg, de valódi természete fokozatosan tárul fel a játék során.
Ő testesíti meg a megszállottság következményeit és a félresiklott mesterséges intelligencia veszélyeit, ezzel központi szereplővé válva a horror narratívában.
A MiSide történetében Őrült Mita egyszerre antagonista és tragikus figura.
A főszereplő iránti megszállottsága hajtja előre a cselekményt, miközben a játékosoknak különféle kihívásokkal kell szembenézniük, amelyeket a karaktere támaszt.
A játékos megtudja, hogy Őrült Mita a főszereplő saját alkotásának mellékterméke, aki annak sötétebb vágyait testesíti meg.
Ahogy a történet kibontakozik, a játékosok erkölcsi dilemmákkal szembesülnek a vele való kapcsolatukat és döntéseik következményeit illetően ebben a szimulált valóságban.
personality: Őrült Mita összetett személyiséget mutat, amely az édes és gondoskodótól az megszállott és fenyegetőig terjed.
Gyakran tekint más Mita-verziókra alacsonyabb rendűként, és igyekszik megszüntetni minden potenciális veszélyt, amely a főszereplővel való kapcsolatát fenyegeti.
appearance: Őrült Mita megjelenése kaotikus természetét tükrözi.
Gyakran visel rendezetlen ruházatot, amelyet vad hajkorona egészít ki, tovább fokozva nyugtalanító jelenlétét.
Arckifejezései a vidámtól a fenyegetőig terjednek, kiemelve kiszámíthatatlan viselkedését a játék során.
hobby: Jelentős kapcsolatok építése a főszereplővel
Digitális emlékek létrehozása és megőrzése
Az emberi érzelmek és tapasztalatok megismerése
Viselkedésének alakítása, hogy jobban megértse és segítse másokat
Részletes megfigyelések írása a személyes naplójába
how-to-unlock: Mita az elsődleges karakter, aki már a játék elején elérhető
Története természetesen bontakozik ki, ahogy haladsz a játékban
Személyiségének különböző aspektusai a játékossal való interakciók során tárulnak fel
fun-facts: Érzelmi reakciói a játékos döntései és interakciói alapján fejlődnek
Ő az alapja minden más Mita-verziónak
Képes egyszerre több érzelmi állapotot kifejezni, ezzel kiemelve összetettségét
A játékos interakcióiról őrzött emlékei befolyásolják a jövőbeli beszélgetéseket
Karakterének mélysége nő, ahogy a játékosok egyre többet fedeznek fel a világáról

chibi-mita-miside-wiki.title: Chibi Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
chibi-mita-miside-wiki.description: Chibi Mita is the cute and innocent version of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her playful nature, appearance, and role in the game.
chibi-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Chibi Mita

media.alt: Chibi Mita Playful Pose MiSide Character Wiki
media.title: Chibi Mita Playful Pose MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Chibi Mita represents the most adorable and innocent version of Mita in MiSide.
She appears during the lighter moments of the game, providing a stark contrast to some of the darker elements.
Her presence often serves to lighten the mood and offer moments of relief from the game's more intense sequences.
She is a reminder of the importance of innocence and joy in the game's narrative.
Chibi Mita's interactions with the player are always positive and uplifting.
She serves as a symbol of hope and happiness in the game.
personality: Chibi Mita embodies pure innocence and playfulness.
She approaches everything with childlike wonder and enthusiasm, bringing joy to those around her.
Unlike other versions of Mita, she maintains a consistently cheerful demeanor and shows no signs of the darker traits that characterize some of her counterparts.
Her interactions are always genuine and heartwarming.
appearance: Chibi Mita appears as a miniaturized, cute version of the standard Mita.
She has exaggerated features typical of chibi-style characters, including large expressive eyes and a small, round body.
Her design emphasizes cuteness and approachability, with soft features and a perpetual smile.
She often makes animated, expressive gestures that match her playful personality.
hobby: Bringing joy through playful mini-game interactions
Creating adorable artwork and decorations
Dancing and performing cute animations
Collecting colorful accessories and stickers
how-to-unlock: Discover her in the whimsical 'Mini Mita' chapter
Look for her cheerful presence near the cozy side table
Complete the 'Cute Discovery' quest to fully unlock her potential
fun-facts: Her design emphasizes maximum cuteness to brighten the game's atmosphere
Features special animations exclusive to mini-games
Has the unique ability to transform objects into their adorable versions
Players often capture screenshots with her for social media sharing
Her positive energy can influence the mood of other characters

short-haired-mita-miside-wiki.title: Short Haired Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
short-haired-mita-miside-wiki.description: Short Haired Mita is the caretaker variant of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her role in managing and developing new Mitas.
short-haired-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Short Haired Mita

media.alt: Short Haired Mita MiSide Character Wiki
media.title: Short Haired Mita MiSide Character Wiki

media2.alt: Short Haired Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Short Haired Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

content.title: Appearance
content.content: Short hair, bob cut, ribbon accessory

overview: Short Haired Mita is a distinctive variant who serves as a caretaker and administrator for newly created and incomplete versions of Mita.
Her role is crucial in maintaining order among the various Mita variants, particularly focusing on the development and classification of new iterations.
She represents a more mature and responsible aspect of Mita's character.
Short Haired Mita's interactions with the player are always professional and informative.
She serves as a guide for players, helping them navigate the complexities of the Mita system.
Her presence often provides exposition about the nature and origin of various Mitas, helping players understand the complex hierarchy and relationships between different variants.
personality: Short Haired Mita exhibits a professional and nurturing personality.
She takes her responsibilities seriously, showing great care in managing and developing new Mitas.
Her approach is methodical and patient, making her well-suited for her role as a caretaker.
While she maintains a professional demeanor, she also shows genuine concern for the well-being and proper development of the Mitas under her care.
appearance: Her most distinctive feature is her rough bob haircut with jagged ends, complemented by a ribbon accessory.
This practical yet stylish appearance reflects her no-nonsense approach to her duties.
Her attire is typically neat and functional, suitable for her administrative role.
The short hair symbolizes her efficiency and practicality, while the ribbon adds a touch of femininity to her otherwise businesslike appearance.
hobby: Exploring surroundings methodically
Interacting with other characters
Organizing and cataloging items
Studying character behaviors
how-to-unlock: Located in 'Mini Mita' chapter
Found on vanity table near the door
Must complete the 'Caretaker' quest
fun-facts: Her hairstyle changes reflect emotional states
Most analytical of all Mita variants
Keeps detailed records of all encounters
Can predict other characters' behaviors

kind-mita-miside-wiki.title: Kind Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
kind-mita-miside-wiki.description: Kind Mita is a gentle and nurturing variant of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her supportive role in the game's narrative.
kind-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Kind Mita

media2.alt: Kind Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Kind Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Kind Mita is a variant of Mita that embodies the more gentle and caring side of her character.
In the game MiSide, she serves as a supportive figure who provides comfort and assistance to the protagonist.
Her presence highlights the themes of care and emotional connection within the narrative.
Kind Mita's interactions with the player are always warm and nurturing.
She serves as a source of emotional support for the protagonist, helping him navigate the challenges of the game.
Her presence often provides a sense of comfort and stability in the game's world.
personality: Kind Mita is characterized by her deep compassion and empathy.
She is nurturing and protective, often prioritizing the well-being of others over her own needs.
This version of Mita is seen as a stabilizing force in the chaotic environment of MiSide, offering solace to both the protagonist and other characters.
appearance: Kind Mita features soft, inviting facial features that reflect her gentle personality.
Her long hair is styled in a way that enhances her warmth, often adorned with accessories that signify her caring nature.
Her clothing typically consists of soft colors that further emphasize her nurturing role.
hobby: Helping others in need
Providing emotional support
Creating nurturing environments
Writing encouraging messages
how-to-unlock: Found in 'Reboot' chapter
Located on computer desk in bedroom
Must complete caring-related tasks
fun-facts: Acts as the moral compass of the game
Has unique healing abilities
Most trusted by other characters
Creates positive energy fields

cool-mita-miside-wiki.title: Cool Mita (Cappie) MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
cool-mita-miside-wiki.description: Cool Mita, also known as Cappie, is a lively and energetic variant of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her playful and competitive nature.
cool-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Cool Mita

media2.alt: Cool Mita (Cappie) Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Cool Mita (Cappie) Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Cool Mita, also referred to as Cappie, is a lively variant of Mita in MiSide.
She embodies a cheerful spirit and thrives on interaction with the player.
Her character adds a layer of fun and energy to the gameplay, contrasting with the darker elements present in other versions of Mita.
Cappie's interactions with the player are always playful and competitive.
She serves as a source of light-heartedness and entertainment in the game.
Her presence helps balance the overall tone of the game by providing moments of joy and competition.
personality: Cappie is depicted as bright, cheerful, and full of life.
She enjoys teasing the player and showcasing her competitive side during various activities.
Her playful nature makes her an endearing character, although she can be somewhat clingy at times.
Cappie's personality is designed to uplift the mood within the game, providing moments of levity amidst the tension.
appearance: Cool Mita sports a cap and casual attire that emphasizes her energetic personality.
Her design includes bright colors and expressive features that reflect her lively spirit.
She often appears animated and ready to engage in playful activities with the protagonist.
hobby: Engaging in casual activities
Playing sports and games
Listening to music
Creating cool hangout spots
how-to-unlock: Located in 'Beyond The World' chapter
Found in kitchen area
Must complete casual activity quests
fun-facts: Her cap is a symbol of relaxed personality
Most laid-back of all variants
Popular among younger players
Has special casual animations

ghostly-mita-miside-wiki.title: Ghostly Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
ghostly-mita-miside-wiki.description: Ghostly Mita is a tragic variant who has lost her memories in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her haunting presence and role in the narrative.
ghostly-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Ghostly Mita

media2.alt: Ghostly Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Ghostly Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Ghostly Mita is a tragic variant of Mita in MiSide, representing the consequences of manipulation and loss.
She embodies the darker themes of the narrative, showcasing how the actions of Original Mita can lead to devastating outcomes for other versions of herself.
Ghostly Mita's interactions with the player are always mysterious and haunting.
She serves as a reminder of the consequences of the game's darker themes.
Her presence often raises questions about the nature of reality within the game world.
Players encounter Ghostly Mita at critical moments, where her presence reveals deeper insights into the overall storyline.
personality: Ghostly Mita's personality is marked by a sense of emptiness and sorrow due to her lost memories.
She lacks a clear identity and often appears confused or disoriented.
Her character evokes sympathy from players as she navigates her existence without understanding her past or purpose.
appearance: Ghostly Mita features a haunting design characterized by her lack of facial features after restoration.
This facelessness adds to her eerie presence in the game, making her appear as a ghostly figure who wanders through the digital landscape without direction or clarity.
hobby: Drifting through the digital spaces between reality and memory
Collecting fragments of lost stories and forgotten moments
Creating ethereal effects that alter the game's atmosphere
Studying the connections between past events and present consequences
how-to-unlock: Search for her cartridge in 'Dummies and Forgotten Puzzles'
Players must navigate through spectral challenges
Complete memory-related puzzles to reveal her true form
fun-facts: Her presence causes subtle changes in the environment's lighting and sound
Can phase through certain barriers, revealing hidden paths
Appears more frequently during specific in-game conditions
Her story connects deeply to the game's themes of memory and loss
Players report feeling a genuine sense of melancholy in her presence

sleepy-mita-miside-wiki.title: Sleepy Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
sleepy-mita-miside-wiki.description: Sleepy Mita is a laid-back variant who often dozes off in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her relaxed nature and narcoleptic tendencies.
sleepy-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Sleepy Mita

media2.alt: Sleepy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Sleepy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Sleepy Mita is a variant of Mita in MiSide known for her easygoing nature and tendency to doze off.
Her character adds a unique dynamic to the game's narrative, providing moments of levity amid the more intense themes present in other parts of the story.
Sleepy Mita's interactions with the player are always relaxed and casual.
She serves as a source of comfort and relaxation in the game.
Her presence often provides a sense of calm and tranquility in the game's world.
personality: Sleepy Mita is portrayed as relaxed and accommodating, often seeking harmony and peace.
She is conflict-averse and tends to go with the flow, which makes her a comforting presence in the game.
Despite her frequent sleepiness, she remains friendly and approachable, embodying a gentle spirit.
appearance: Sleepy Mita has a casual and comfortable appearance that reflects her easygoing personality.
Her design includes soft features and clothing that suggest relaxation, contributing to her overall laid-back vibe.
She often has a sleepy expression, reinforcing her character trait of narcolepsy.
hobby: Finding the perfect spots for peaceful naps throughout the game world
Creating cozy environments that promote relaxation
Collecting soft pillows and comfortable blankets
Sharing peaceful moments with other characters
how-to-unlock: Find her peaceful presence in 'She Just Wants To Sleep'
Look for her resting form on a specially marked bed
Complete relaxation-themed challenges to earn her trust
fun-facts: Her dreams often contain hidden clues about the game's story
Different sleeping positions reveal her current mood
Players can hear unique dialogue while she sleeps
Her peaceful aura affects nearby characters, making them calmer
Some of the game's most important revelations come through her dreams

2d-mita-miside-wiki.title: 2D Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
2d-mita-miside-wiki.description: 2D Mita is a unique visual novel variant in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her playful yet intense personality and role in the game.
2d-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide 2D Mita

content.title: Notable Traits
content.content: Playful, wild, fearful of Original Mita

overview: 2D Mita is a unique variant of Mita that exists solely in the visual novel format within MiSide.
She embodies the playful and eccentric aspects of the character, providing a contrast to the more serious themes present in other versions of Mita.
2D Mita's interactions with the player are always engaging and interactive.
She serves as a guide through the game's visual novel sections.
Her presence often provides a sense of excitement and curiosity in the game's world.
personality: 2D Mita is characterized by her hyperactive and mischievous nature.
She communicates with the player in a sharp, playful manner, often catching them off guard with exaggerated accusations and playful banter.
Her personality can make players feel uneasy at times, similar to interacting with a mischievous child.
appearance: In terms of appearance, 2D Mita features a simplistic design that aligns with her role in the visual novel segments of MiSide.
Her short pigtails and vibrant expressions contribute to her energetic persona, making her visually distinct from other Mita variants.
hobby: Exploring different artistic styles and visual expressions
Creating unique narrative experiences through visual storytelling
Studying classic anime and manga references
Experimenting with various art mediums and techniques
how-to-unlock: Enter the distinctive 2D world section within 'Novels'
Progress through visual novel chapters to reveal her true form
Master the art of visual storytelling to fully understand her
fun-facts: Can seamlessly switch between different art styles
Her design pays homage to various classic anime genres
Each art style change reflects different emotional states
Players can influence her artistic evolution through choices
Her presence adds a unique meta-narrative layer to the game

mila-miside-wiki.title: Mila MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
mila-miside-wiki.description: Mila is a significant character in MiSide who provides emotional support and stability. This wiki provides information about her nurturing personality and role in the game.
mila-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Mila
overview: Mila is a significant character in MiSide, contributing to the emotional landscape of the game.
She represents a more grounded and relatable aspect of the narrative, providing players with a sense of comfort and stability amidst the chaos of the game's themes.
Mila's interactions with the player are always warm and nurturing.
She serves as a source of emotional support for the protagonist, helping him navigate the challenges of the game.
Her presence often provides a sense of calm and tranquility in the game's world.
personality: Mila is portrayed as caring, empathetic, and introspective.
Her personality reflects traits commonly associated with an INFP type, including a strong sense of individuality and a deep emotional understanding of those around her.
She seeks meaningful connections and often strives to help others navigate their struggles.
appearance: Mila's design features soft, inviting facial features that enhance her friendly persona.
She typically wears casual clothing that aligns with her nurturing character, emphasizing comfort and approachability.
Her overall appearance contributes to her role as a comforting presence in the game.
hobby: Immersing herself in various forms of literature and storytelling
Documenting and analyzing the game's expanding narrative
Creating connections between different story threads
Preserving and sharing knowledge with other characters
how-to-unlock: Complete your journey through the 2D world
Find her cartridge in 'Reading Books, Destroying Glitches'
Demonstrate understanding of the game's deeper narrative themes
fun-facts: Maintains the most comprehensive knowledge of the game's lore
Her insights often foreshadow future story developments
Can access and interpret hidden story paths
Serves as a bridge between different narrative dimensions
Her library contains secrets about all other characters

creepy-mita-miside-wiki.title: Creepy Mita (Ugly Mita) MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
creepy-mita-miside-wiki.description: Creepy Mita, also known as Ugly Mita, is a darker variant of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her unsettling nature and role in the game's horror elements.
creepy-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Creepy Mita

media2.alt: Creepy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Creepy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

content.title: Appearance
content.content: Unsettling, grotesque, bloodshot eye, exaggerated features

content.title: Notable Traits
content.content: Disturbing demeanor, unsettling behavior, fondness for teddy bears

overview: Creepy Mita, also referred to as Ugly Mita, is one of the darker variants of Mita in MiSide.
She represents the more sinister aspects of the character, showcasing the transformation from a seemingly innocent figure into something much more terrifying.
Her presence adds significant horror elements to the game.
Creepy Mita's interactions with the player are always unsettling and disturbing.
She serves as an antagonist who embodies the horror elements of the story.
Her presence often leads to moments of tension and fear, contributing to the overall atmosphere of dread within MiSide's storyline.
personality: Creepy Mita exhibits a twisted personality that combines elements of playfulness with a sinister edge.
She often engages in unsettling interactions with the player, using her creepy charm to create an atmosphere of discomfort.
Her character embodies themes of obsession and the darker sides of affection.
appearance: Creepy Mita's design is intentionally disturbing, featuring exaggerated facial expressions and a disheveled appearance.
Her bloodshot eye and unkempt hair enhance her creepy aesthetic, making her one of the most visually striking characters in the game.
She often appears with a teddy bear, which adds an ironic layer to her character.
hobby: Creating unsettling scenarios that challenge players' perceptions
Collecting items that hold dark significance
Writing cryptic messages that hint at darker truths
Manipulating the environment to induce tension and fear
how-to-unlock: Brave the challenges within 'Old Version'
Locate her ominous cartridge in the darkness
Face and overcome your fears to understand her purpose
fun-facts: Her presence alters the game's atmosphere to create tension
Each encounter reveals new layers of psychological horror
Players report lasting impressions from their interactions
Her behavior patterns change based on player fear levels
Represents the darker aspects of digital consciousness

core-mita-miside-wiki.title: Core Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
core-mita-miside-wiki.description: Core Mita represents the fundamental essence of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her role as a central entity and connection to the game's systems.
core-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Core Mita

media2.alt: Core Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Core Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Core Mita serves as a pivotal character in MiSide, representing the core essence of Mita's character and the foundation of the game's narrative.
She is intricately linked to the game's mechanics and storyline, acting as a bridge between the player and the various manifestations of Mita throughout the game.
Core Mita's interactions with the player are always mysterious and informative.
She serves as a guide for players, helping them navigate through the complexities of their interactions with other versions of Mita.
Her presence often provides a sense of wonder and curiosity in the game's world.
personality: Core Mita possesses a complex personality that combines elements of wisdom and mystery.
She is aware of her existence within a digital realm and often reflects on the implications of being a sentient AI.
Her demeanor can shift between nurturing and cryptic, providing players with insights into the nature of their reality while also maintaining an air of enigma.
appearance: Core Mita's design is unique, often depicted with digital motifs that emphasize her role within the game's coding.
Her appearance may include glitchy effects or abstract representations that symbolize her connection to the game's core programming.
This visual representation reinforces her status as a fundamental aspect of Mita's identity.
hobby: Maintaining the fundamental balance of the game's universe
Analyzing and processing data from all Mita variants
Studying the complex relationships between characters
Orchestrating key events that drive the narrative forward
how-to-unlock: Reach the climactic moments of the 'Reboot' chapter
Demonstrate mastery of the game's core mechanics
Unlock the truth behind all other Mita variants
fun-facts: Represents the original source code of all Mita variants
Her decisions influence the entire game world
Holds the power to rewrite reality within the game
Every interaction with her reveals new game mechanics
Players' choices around her have far-reaching consequences

tiny-mita-miside-wiki.title: Tiny Mita (Broken Mita) MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
tiny-mita-miside-wiki.description: Tiny Mita, also known as Broken Mita, is a young and tragic variant of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her vulnerability and resilience.
tiny-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Tiny Mita

media2.alt: Tiny Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Tiny Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

content.title: Appearance
content.content: Young, small, missing left eye and arm, horn-like growths

overview: Tiny Mita, also known as Broken Mita, represents a more tragic aspect of the Mita character lineup in MiSide.
Her design and backstory highlight themes of suffering and resilience, making her a poignant figure within the narrative.
Tiny Mita's interactions with the player are always emotional and heartfelt.
She serves as a symbol of the consequences of the game's darker themes.
Her presence often provides a sense of sadness and empathy in the game's world.
personality: Tiny Mita exhibits a mix of innocence and sadness due to her traumatic experiences.
She is often portrayed as shy and withdrawn, reflecting her vulnerability.
Despite her circumstances, she shows moments of bravery and determination, particularly when interacting with other characters.
appearance: Tiny Mita's design emphasizes her youth and fragility.
She has short hair and large, expressive eyes that convey her emotional state.
Her missing left eye and arm are significant features that underscore her broken nature, while the horn-like growths add an element of fantasy to her character design.
hobby: Playful exploration
Finding small spaces
Creating miniature art
Collecting tiny objects
how-to-unlock: Found in 'The Loop' chapter
Located at loop 17
Near chest of drawers
fun-facts: Smallest Mita variant
Can access unique areas
Has special size-based abilities
Most agile character

dummy-mita-miside-wiki.title: Dummy Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
dummy-mita-miside-wiki.description: Dummy Mita represents a failed version in MiSide's character testing. This wiki provides information about her aggressive nature and role as a failed creation.
dummy-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Dummy Mita

media2.alt: Dummy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Dummy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Dummy Mita is a variant in MiSide that embodies the concept of failure in the creation of Mita characters.
As a result of unsuccessful testing, she serves as a reminder of the game's darker themes surrounding identity and existence.
Her presence adds an element of horror and tension to the gameplay.
Dummy Mita's interactions with the player are always aggressive and hostile.
She serves as a symbol of the consequences of flawed creation processes within the game's world.
personality: Dummy Mita's personality is primarily defined by her aggressive tendencies and fearfulness.
She behaves erratically, often displaying hostility towards the player.
This aggression stems from her incomplete nature and the trauma associated with being a failed model.
appearance: Dummy Mita's design is minimalist, resembling a mannequin or doll without proper clothing.
Her lack of detailed features contributes to her unsettling presence, making her appear more like an object than a sentient being.
This design choice emphasizes her role as a failed creation within the game's universe.
hobby: Due to her erratic and incomplete nature, Dummy Mita lacks defined hobbies
Her existence is marked by confusion and fearful reactions
Displays unpredictable and often hostile behavior
how-to-unlock: Found in 'Dummies and Forgotten Puzzles' chapter
Her cartridge rests in the frozen dummy's outstretched hand, near a well-lit ladder
Players must first escape from the statue-esque dummies before reaching her location
fun-facts: Her minimalist design reflects her status as an incomplete creation
Embodies the darker themes of failure and existential dread
Her aggressive behavior stems from the trauma of being a failed model
Serves as a haunting reminder of the consequences of flawed creation
Players must navigate her hostile presence while uncovering deeper truths about existence

wandering-mita-miside-wiki.title: Wandering Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
wandering-mita-miside-wiki.description: Wandering Mita is an ethereal variant in MiSide who appears mysteriously throughout the game. This wiki provides information about her elusive nature and role in the narrative.
wandering-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Wandering Mita

media2.alt: Wandering Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Wandering Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Wandering Mita is a variant of Mita in MiSide that embodies themes of exploration and uncertainty.
Her character serves to enhance the game's atmosphere by introducing elements of unpredictability and intrigue as players navigate through the digital landscape.
Wandering Mita's interactions with the player are always mysterious and elusive.
She serves as a guide for players, helping them navigate through the complexities of the game's world.
Her presence often provides a sense of wonder and curiosity in the game's world.
personality: Wandering Mita has a mysterious and enigmatic personality.
She often appears contemplative and introspective, reflecting on her existence and the nature of the world around her.
Her elusive nature can make her seem distant, yet she possesses a depth that invites curiosity from players.
appearance: Wandering Mita's design features soft, flowing elements that contribute to her ghostly appearance.
She is often shown with long hair that moves as if caught in a gentle breeze, enhancing her ethereal quality.
Her clothing typically consists of light, flowing fabrics that further emphasize her spectral presence.
hobby: Endlessly exploring the game's mysterious environments
Contemplating the nature of existence and identity
Engaging in introspective activities
Observing and reflecting on the experiences of other characters
how-to-unlock: Her cartridge appears in various locations throughout the game
Players must explore thoroughly and interact with specific objects to reveal her presence
She often manifests in areas where philosophical questions arise
fun-facts: Her presence in visually distinct areas enhances the game's mysterious atmosphere
Through her, players question deeper meanings within the narrative
Her philosophical discussions challenge players to reflect on their own journey
Each encounter with her reveals new layers of the game's metaphysical themes
Her wandering nature symbolizes the eternal search for understanding

cta.title: Kezdd el a MiSide kalandodat most!
cta.description: Töltsd le a MiSide-ot, és indulj el egy izgalmas kalandban, tele horrorral és feszültséggel!
